title: Maryland and Texas Firms Recall Broccoli Salad Kits With Dressing For Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: This release is being reissued to reflect an additional 22,849 pounds of products produced on dates not included in the Oct. 25, 2013 initial recall. WASHINGTON, Oct. 29, 2013 Taylor Farms Maryland, Inc. in Jessup, Md. and Taylor Farms Texas Inc. in Dallas...

establishment.name: Taylor Farms TX, Inc.
establishment.address:
1171 N. Cockrell Hill Rd. 
  Dallas, TX 75211

impacted_products: 6.06-lb. boxes labeled “TAYLOR FARMS BROCCOLI CRUNCH WITH BACON AND DRESSING” with the case code 310151, produced on Oct. 14 through Oct. 24, 2013.
12.13-lb. boxes labeled “TAYLOR FARMS BROCCOLI CRUNCH WITH BACON AND DRESSING” with the case code 310153, produced Oct. 14 through Oct. 24, 2013.
6.33-lb boxes labeled “Kit, Broc PPC” with case code 5900067, produced Oct. 15 through Oct. 20, 2013.
